name: Pickaxe Tower
description:
Pickaxe Tower Made for the Miz Jam #1 Controls:
  • Use the mouse to aim;
  • Left mouse button: use your pickaxe;
  • Right mouse button: pause.
Credits:
  • Coding, design: Delta-key
  • Design, playtesting: Sucraiso
  • Graphics: Kenney;
  • Text fonts: Daniel Linssen;
  • SFX:  Kenney Game Assets 1;
  • Music: Celestialghost8.
Software credits:
  • Engine: Godot Engine v3.2.1 Stable;
  • Sprite editing: Libresprite v1.0-dev, GIMP v2.10.18.
Feedback is very welcome! Thanks for playing!
